Class ReviewController

java.lang.Object
com.cafe.backend.controller.ReviewController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/reviews") public class ReviewController extends Object
The ReviewController serves as the RESTful API entry point for managing reviews.

This controller handles HTTP requests from the frontend and interacts with the service layer to perform CRUD operations on ReviewDTO objects.

Supported operations include creating a review, updating it, and retrieving reviews by cafeteria or user.

  • Method Details

    • createReview

      @PostMapping @ResponseStatus(CREATED) public ReviewDTO createReview(@RequestBody ReviewDTO reviewDTO) throws BadRequestException, NotFoundException
      Creates a new review.
      Parameters:
      reviewDTO - The data of the review to be created.
      Returns:
      The created review as a ReviewDTO.
      Throws:
      BadRequestException - if the request data is invalid.
      NotFoundException - if referenced entities are not found.

    • updateReview

      @PutMapping("/{id}") @ResponseStatus(OK) public ReviewDTO updateReview(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @RequestBody ReviewDTO updatedReviewDTO) throws NotFoundException, BadRequestException
      Updates an existing review by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the review to update.
      updatedReviewDTO - The new data for the review.
      Returns:
      The updated review as a ReviewDTO.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the review with the given ID does not exist.
      BadRequestException - if the provided data is invalid.

    • getReviewsByCafeteriaId

      @GetMapping("/{cafeteriaid}") @ResponseStatus(OK) public List<ReviewDTO> getReviewsByCafeteriaId(@PathVariable("cafeteriaid") Long id) throws NotFoundException, BadRequestException
      Retrieves all reviews associated with a specific cafeteria.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the cafeteria.
      Returns:
      A list of ReviewDTO objects related to the cafeteria.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the cafeteria or reviews are not found.
      BadRequestException - if the request is invalid.

    • getReviewsByUserId

      @GetMapping("/user/{userId}") @ResponseStatus(OK) public List<ReviewDTO> getReviewsByUserId(@PathVariable Long userId) throws BadRequestException, NotFoundException
      Retrieves all reviews submitted by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      Returns:
      A list of ReviewDTO objects submitted by the user.
      Throws:
      BadRequestException - if the request is invalid.
      NotFoundException - if the user or their reviews are not found.
